name: Yassen
title: Backend Engineer
description: I build robust, scalable backend systems and APIs that power modern web applications. Specializing in Laravel, Node.js, and clean architecture.
bio: I'm a passionate Backend Engineer with 6 months of experience building scalable web applications and APIs. My journey in software development has been driven by a love for clean code, system architecture, and solving complex technical challenges.

I specialize in Laravel and Node.js, creating robust backend systems that handle everything from user authentication to complex business logic. I believe in writing maintainable code and following best practices to deliver high-quality solutions.
